A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
High expectations after The Force Awakens and the fantastic Rogue One. But what a let down this one is. Clumsy screenplay\, poor directing\, little or no real character development and ridiculous Harry Potterish additions to the 'force'.
Leia flying in space? Seriously. 
And then there's those space 'bombers' What the heck. 
So much potential wasted.
Why on earth would you change director's again.
